body: Hi Abraham and Ugur, Abraham, I think all you needed was flattening the test points (Image below), however, It reminded me that I should unFlatten the test points from the realTimeRadiation analysis component. [I added this as an enhancement](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/issues/36). Ugur, as Abraham mentioned the results makes sense. I wonder if you are concerned about the drastic change in the color? You may want to use legendParameter and set the minimum to 0 so the colors make more sense. Something like image below. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/IivmNnZoXsmiIxieHqTYtu0-4hnqawJJ9Cv5ZVx-eGxWEm7f0fsfvJBeBlok6DKRnhGYCEqkJavcfKL4skONddqZP*pjN8a5/radiationAnalysisResultsRemap.png)
